thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 18 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ASML Holding Plans To Ship 20 EUV Systems In 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ASML Holding Plans To Ship 20 EUV Systems In 2018
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - ASML Holding NV:
* ASML HOLDING NV - EXPECTS Q2 2018 NET SALES BETWEEN EUR 2.5 BILLION AND EUR 2.6 BILLION
* ASML HOLDING NV - EXPECTS Q2 2018 GROSS MARGIN AROUND 43 PERCENT REFLECTING A SIGNIFICANT INCREASE IN EUV SALES
* ASML HOLDING NV - CONTINUED GROWTH OF OUR EUV BUSINESS IS CONFIRMED BY NINE MORE ORDERS FOR NXE:3400B EUV SYSTEMS IN Q1
* ASML HOLDING NV - PLAN TO SHIP 20 EUV SYSTEMS IN 2018
* ASML HOLDING NV - PLAN TO HAVE PRODUCTION CAPACITY FOR AT LEAST 30 EUV SYSTEMS IN 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
